means: 探求现象变化的，历时的

sentence.Network_en: Reduction is a trend of language diachronic evolvement.
sentence.Network_cn: 简约是语言历时演变的一种趋势.

sentence.Network_en: Diachronic linguistics is the study of a language through the course of its history.
sentence.Network_cn: 历时语言学是在语言的历史过程中研究语言的.

sentence.Network_en: Finally, I try to re - examine Deleuze's question of thinking from a synchronic and a diachronic viewpoint.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后, 我试图从共时性和历时性两个角度重新检验德勒兹的思考问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 论及历时性(diachronic)与共时性(synchronic) 文学研究时，批露对话性与多音复呈(polyphonic)，不但可比较新趋势间的差异，更可代 …
从历时 (diachronic) 的观点去看, 我们可以发觉格式是不断变化的, 但这不表示格式可以随意改变, 因为从共时 (synchronic) 的观点看.
任何把历时的（diachronic）事件还原成共时(synchronous)事件的办法，都不足以规定人的本质。现代生物技术不能破坏进化的链条。
石油英语词汇(D3)|生物化学专业英语词汇 ... diachroneity 穿时性 diachronic 地球纪年的 diachronism 穿时性.

list.abs: diachronism 穿时性diachronous event 穿时事件diachronous reservoir rock 跨时储集岩
什么意思... ... Diachronic studies 历时研究 diachronic change 历时变化 diachronic derivability 历时可导性.
病历分析,Analysis... ... ) history analysis 历史分析 ) diachronic analysis 历时分析 ) Analysis of case history 病历分析.
...其它组成部分一样，可以从不同的角度来进行。共时语言学（synchronic linguistics）和历时语言学（diachronic linguistics）就是两种大不相同的方法。共时语言学研究在某一时期的状态，历时语言学研究语言的演变发展。这两种方式尽管.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from dia- 'through' + Greek khronos 'time' + -ic

means.word_mean: 1. used of the study of a phenomenon (especially language) as it changes through time;

auth_sentence.content: Social anthropologists generally study synchronic problems while historians study diachronic problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: Social anthropologists generally study synchronic problems while historians study diachronic problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Social anthropologists generally study synchronic problems while historians study diachronic problems.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps this will do for the innate hardwired language approach what diachronic philology did for synchronic studies of language.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps this will do for the innate hardwired language approach what diachronic philology did for synchronic studies of language.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps this will do for the innate hardwired language approach what diachronic philology did for synchronic studies of language.
